Title: Piazza Fontana: The Italian Conspiracy
Writer: Paolo Cucchiarelli (book), Marco Tullio Giordana (screenplay), Sandro Petraglia (screenplay), Stefano Rulli (screenplay)
Actors: Valerio Mastandrea, Pierfrancesco Favino, Michela Cescon, Giorgio Colangeli
Plot: A chronicle of the 1969 bombing at a major national bank in Milan and its aftermath.
